thread.title: Destiny’s Next Patch Will Fix Broken Loot Drops, More Crucible Issues
thread.title_full: Destiny’s Next Patch Will Fix Broken Loot Drops, More Crucible Issues

title: Destiny’s Next Patch Will Fix Broken Loot Drops, More Crucible Issues
text:
Destiny’s Next Patch Will Fix Broken Loot Drops, More Crucible Issues 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Today 
Bungie says after complaints about loot drops in the Crucible, they have discovered a bug causing Legendary end-of-match rewards to be rarer...
